column1: Lord of the Ring or Lord of the Rings was a title for Sauron
column2: the master of the One Ring. The singular form appeared only once
column4: who was ignorant of its meaning. The plural form appeared only thrice; once in Gandalfs correction of the above mishap
column5: once by Glorfindel during the Council of Elrond
